meanings.sent1: The professor discussed the metapsychological aspects of the mind in his lecture.
meanings.sent2: Her research delves into the metapsychological theories of human behavior.
meanings.sent3: It was a metapsychological puzzle trying to understand why the cat kept chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting captured the metapsychological essence of dreams and reality blending together.
meanings.sent5: The book painted a vivid metapsychological picture of the subconscious mind.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the theoretical aspects of psychology beyond the scope of empirical observation and experimentation.
meanings.sent1: The students were intrigued by the metapsychological concepts presented in the textbook.
meanings.sent2: The researchers explored the metapsychological realm of consciousness and perception.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking tree was a metapsychological twist in the fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a metapsychological impact, delving into the depths of human thought.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a metapsychological journey through the character's inner struggles.
